meanings.definition: More than two but not many
meanings.sent1: I have several toys to play with.
meanings.sent2: There are several apples on the tree.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel gathered several nuts for the winter.
meanings.sent4: The teacher praised the student for making several improvements.
meanings.sent5: The detective found several clues to solve the mystery.

meanings.definition: Separate or distinct individuals or items
meanings.sent1: In the garden, I planted several flowers.
meanings.sent2: The store sells several types of candy.
meanings.sent3: At the party, there were several guests wearing hats.
meanings.sent4: The artist painted several birds in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The library has several books on different topics.

meanings.sent1: I only need several minutes to finish this task.
meanings.sent2: There are several reasons why I like this movie.
meanings.sent3: The chef added several spices to enhance the flavor.
meanings.sent4: The musician played several notes on the piano.
meanings.sent5: The hiker saw several deer in the forest.
